description: This Python source file defines an AI agent called 'Agno Assist' designed to support developers working with the Agno framework. It imports various modules, sets up paths, initializes knowledge and storage components, and configures the agent with tools, instructions, and behavior for providing explanations, code examples, and multimedia responses related to the Agno framework.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent that can perform tasks, utilize tools, and interact with users.

classes.name: OpenAIEmbedder
classes.description: Embeds text using OpenAI's models for knowledge representation.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: Stores and manages knowledge sourced from URLs.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model used for conversational AI.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of session data in an SQLite database.

classes.name: DalleTools
classes.description: Provides tools for generating images with DALL-E 3.

classes.name: ElevenLabsTools
classes.description: Provides tools for text-to-speech using ElevenLabs.

classes.name: PythonTools
classes.description: Tools for executing or analyzing Python code.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: Vector database implementation for knowledge search.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the 'agno_assist' agent to output responses, optionally streaming.
